#summary Expansions / improvements on GoogleCL from other sources

WARNING: Tips / links / claims found on this page haven't necessarily been tested by anyone affiliated with Google or the GoogleCL project. If you have a problem using one of these expansions, your best bet is to find and contact the original author.

= Devices =
Reports of devices that will run GoogleCL.

==Do-it-yourself==

=== Android ===
A little bit of hackery, and your Android will speak your calendar to you. A guide can be found [http://publicint.blogspot.com/2010/06/build-talking-calendar-with-googlecl.html here]

=Other=
===Shell completion===
[http://code.google.com/p/googlecl/issues/detail?id=73#c1 This] comment contains a bash completion script, and so does [http://github.com/bobthecow/googlecl-completion this] github repo. To install one, copy it to /etc/bash_completion.d
